Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ModelLight

Class LightPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ModelLight.LightPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class LightPlayer extends Object implements Serializable
LightPlayer is the serialized class that contains the Player information to be sent to the client
